title: Solution Advisor Expert
description:
**We help the world run better**

At SAP, we enable you to bring out your best. Our company culture is focused on collaboration and a shared passion to help the world run better. How? We focus every day on building the foundation for tomorrow and creating a workplace that embraces differences, values flexibility, and is aligned to our purpose-driven and future-focused work. We offer a highly collaborative, caring team environment with a strong focus on learning and development, recognition for your individual contributions, and a variety of benefit options for you to choose from.

**What you'll do:**


As the Solution Advisor (SA), you will be the go-to person for any solution or product questions within the sales team. You will leverage your deep expertise in specific solutions to support the entire sales cycle, from identifying opportunities to post-sale customer support. Additionally, you will assist customers in expanding their current SAP footprint to maximize value for their organization.


Solution: **SAP BDC (Business Data Cloud)**

* Provide deep solution-specific expertise to support new sales and adoption for key customers
* Provide both standard and customized/personalized solution demonstrations that bring SAP solutions to life and show customers the value of SAP.
* Support the Account Team by delivering solution presentations and events to identify and qualify new opportunities and drive adoption and consumption of SAP solutions
* Establish yourself as a thought leader within the account team and fine-tune account strategy
* Transition engagement to implementation partner/services teams effectively
* Engage with customers to continue selling the vision of SAP solutions and ensure eagerness for renewal
* Leverage digital assets throughout the customer engagement, including demos, presentations, and other content

 **What you bring:**

* Professional experience with large, multi-national software/IT organizations and with a demonstrated expertise within the solution segment
* In-depth knowledge of SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP), with a focus on SAP data management solutions such as SAP HANA, SAP Datasphere, SAP BW4HANA and SAP SAC (including SAC Planning).
* Strong expertise in data management principles and best practices in the context of cloud data warehousing, data lakes, and advanced analytics using SAP’s cloud solutions.
* Understanding of multi-cloud and hybrid-cloud environments and their integration with SAP solutions.
* Working knowledge of Cloud, Hosted Services, and SAAS (software as a service)/ PAAS (platform as a service)/ IAAS (Infrastructure as a Service) models, cloud-based commerce/ business networks.
* Focus on creating compelling storylines and themes for customer interactions
* Ability to quickly understand customer business goals and ensure they are at the center of recommended solutions
* Passion and energy in all customer interactions

 **Education and Qualifications / Skills and Competencies**

  



**Personal skills:**

* Bachelor equivalent: minimum requirement
* Master equivalent: optional
* Ability to work in international and virtual teams
* Fluency in Swedish and English, any other language an asset.

**Mobility**

* Ability and willingness to travel

  

**Bring out your best**


SAP innovations help more than four hundred thousand customers worldwide work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. Originally known for leadership in enterprise resource planning (ERP) software, SAP has evolved to become a market leader in end-to-end business application software and related services for database, analytics, intelligent technologies, and experience management. As a cloud company with two hundred million users and more than one hundred thousand employees worldwide, we are purpose-driven and future-focused, with a highly collaborative team ethic and commitment to personal development. Whether connecting global industries, people, or platforms, we help ensure every challenge gets the solution it deserves. At SAP, you can bring out your best.

**We win with inclusion**


SAP’s culture of inclusion, focus on health and well-being, and flexible working models help ensure that everyone – regardless of background – feels included and can run at their best. At SAP, we believe we are made stronger by the unique capabilities and qualities that each person brings to our company, and we invest in our employees to inspire confidence and help everyone realize their full potential. We ultimately believe in unleashing all talent and creating a better and more equitable world.  

SAP is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to the values of Equal Employment Opportunity and provide accessibility accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are interested in applying for employment with SAP and are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team: Careers@sap.com  

For SAP employees: Only permanent roles are eligible for the SAP Employee Referral Program, according to the eligibility rules set in the SAP Referral Policy. Specific conditions may apply for roles in Vocational Training.

**EOE AA M/F/Vet/Disability:**


Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their age, race, religion, national origin, ethnicity, age, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, et al), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, protected veteran status, or disability.  

Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor.


Requisition ID: 422505 | Work Area: Presales | Expected Travel: 0 - 10% | Career Status: Professional | Employment Type: Regular Full Time | Additional Locations: #LI-Hybrid.
company_description: SAP's purpose is to help the world run better and improve people's lives with sustainability at the core.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description:
**What makes us Qlik?**
Qlik delivers the best in data, analytics, and AI technology, to help enterprises around the world drive value from their data. Our leading, AI-powered platform enables users to uncover insights that lead to better business decisions, faster.

A Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ Leader for 13 years in a row, Qlik is a values-driven organization, and following its acquisition of Talend, now serves over 45,000 customers in 100 countries worldwide. Read on to see what we’re looking for right now!**The Machine Learning Engineer****Role**

  

Join Qlik as a ML Engineer and be at the forefront of shaping the future of AI in the data and analytics field. Contribute to developing innovative AI products, solving complex challenges, and pioneering the responsible and ethical implementation of AI.

**What makes this role interesting?**

* **Hands-on AI Development:** Work on statistical models, generative AI, and classification systems—including large language models and transformers—to support analytics tasks and help users make data-driven decisions.
* **Team Collaboration:** Work closely with data scientists and engineers to build AI solutions that are practical and user-friendly.
* **Diverse & Inclusive Team:** Join an international team where learning and collaboration are encouraged.
* **Real-World Impact:** Design unit and integration tests for AI models to ensure software changes improve model performance and meet quality standards before release.
* **AI Model Optimization:** Support the improvement of AI models, fine-tuning their performance to enhance decision-making.

 **Here’s how you’ll be making an impact:**

* **Building AI Solutions:** Contribute to the development of AI-driven features that enhance user analytics and decision-making.
* **User-Centric Development:** Work with cross-functional teams to understand user needs and help implement AI solutions that are practical and user-friendly.
* **Feature Implementation:** Collaborate with product and engineering teams to build and improve key AI functionalities.
* **Data-Driven Model Validation:** Establish automated validation processes that compare AI model outputs over time, helping ensure consistent and predictable improvements.
* **Engineering Best Practices:** Apply software development best practices—including testing, automation, and CI/CD—to integrate data-driven model validation into our workflows.
* **Continuous Learning:** Stay informed about advancements in AI and machine learning, applying relevant techniques to improve our models.

 **We’re looking for a teammate with:**

 **Bachelor’s or Master’s degree** in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Data Science, or a related field.

**2****+** **years of experience** developing AI/ML software in a production environment.

**Proficiency in Python** and familiarity with other programming languages like Golang, Java, or C++.

**Hands-on experience with machine learning frameworks** such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or scikit-learn.

**Understanding of modern AI models**, including large language models and transformer-based architectures.

**Experience with cloud platforms** (AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud) in a development or deployment context.

**Familiarity with structured and unstructured data sources**, including vector databases, knowledge graphs, or prompt engineering.

**Basic knowledge of SQL and NoSQL databases** (e.g., PostgreSQL, MongoDB, or ElasticSearch).

**A strong willingness to learn and stay updated** on emerging trends and advancements in AI.

 **The****location****for this role is:**

  

Lund, Sweden

**More about Qlik and who we are:**
Find out more about life at Qlik on social: **Instagram**, **LinkedIn**, **YouTube**, and **X/Twitter**, and to see all other opportunities to join us + our values, check out our **Careers Page**.

What else do we offer?
* Genuine career progression pathways and mentoring programs
* Culture of innovation, technology, collaboration, and openness
* Flexible, diverse, and international work environment



Giving back is a huge part of our culture. Alongside an extra “change the world” day plus another for personal development, we also highly encourage participation in our **Corporate Responsibility Employee Programs*****Qlik is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action*****Employer,*****and we value the diversity of our workforce*****.**Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, or disability status. Click here to review the US Department of Labor’s **Equal Employment Opportunity Posters**, including the **EEO is The Law** notice and the **Pay TransparencyNondiscrimination Provision**.***If you need assistance due to disability during the application and/or recruiting process, please contact us via the******Accessibility Request Form******.***
Qlik is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms for this employment opportunity. Please, no phone calls or emails. All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at Qlik via-email, the Internet or in any form and/or method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of Qlik. No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by Qlik as a result of the referral or through other means.
#LI-EMEA
company_description: Qlik is a global software company headquartered in King of Prussia, Pennsylvania. Qlik provides an end-to-end, real-time data integration and analytics cloud platform.

title: Sr Development Manager
description:
**What makes us Qlik?**
Qlik delivers the best in data, analytics, and AI technology, to help enterprises around the world drive value from their data. Our leading, AI-powered platform enables users to uncover insights that lead to better business decisions, faster.

A Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ Leader for 14 years in a row, Qlik is a values-driven organization, and following its acquisition of Talend, now serves over 45,000 customers in 100 countries worldwide. Read on to see what we’re looking for right now!**The Senior Machine Learning Engineer****Role**

  

Join Qlik as a Senior ML Engineer and be at the forefront of shaping the future of AI in the data and analytics field. Contribute to developing innovative AI products, solving complex challenges, and pioneering the responsible and ethical implementation of AI.

 **What makes this role interesting?**

 **Diverse Use Cases:** Design, develop, and maintain a set of AI products that address a diverse range of use cases, including predictive, generative, and classification scenarios.

 **Collaborative Innovation:** Collaborate with a dynamic team of data scientists, software engineers, and domain experts to create user-friendly AI solutions.

 **Multicultural Environment:** Be part of a multicultural and highly collaborative environment, contributing to a creative and team-oriented culture.

 **Pioneering Integration:** Pioneer the combination of structured and unstructured data, unlocking new use cases and hidden insights.

 **LLM Training & AI Agents**: Train and optimize large language models for new tasks in data analytics, developing intelligent agents that enhance decision-making, automate insights, and improve user interaction with AI-driven analytics.

 **Here’s how you’ll be making an impact:**

* **Strategic Footprint:** Directly influence the footprint of Qlik's AI products, contributing to a strategic investment in AI.
* **User-Centric Solutions:** Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand user requirements and implement impactful and user-friendly AI solutions.
* **Critical Functionality Delivery:** Work with product design teams to deliver critical functionalities supporting our AI vision.
* **Technology Evaluation:** Identify and evaluate new technologies, enhancing the performance, maintainability, and reliability of our machine learning systems.
* **Best Practices Application:** Apply software engineering best practices, including CI/CD, automation, monitoring, and security.
* **Research-Driven Innovation:** Stay updated with the latest AI and machine learning research, replicate key findings, and adapt innovative concepts to enhance our AI products. **Develop exploratory prototypes** to explore and validate emerging techniques before full-scale implementation.

 **We’re looking for a teammate with:**

  

* Master's or Ph.D. in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Data Science, or a related field.
* 5+ years of experience building production-quality AI/ML software.
* Programming proficiency in languages like Python, Golang, Java, C++.
* Experience with structured data using popular machine learning libraries and frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn, Langchain, Langgraph etc).
* Familiarity with foundational models.
* 3+ years of experience with cloud service providers.
* Expertise in working with structured and unstructured data sources, including RAG, vector databases, knowledge graphs, grounding, prompt engineering, chain-of-thought, pre-training, and fine-tuning.
* Familiarity with SQL programming and SQL/NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB, ElasticSearch).
* Demonstrated ability to stay abreast of emerging trends and techniques in the field of AI.

 **The****location****for this role is:**

  

Lund, Sweden

Find out more about life at Qlik on social: **Instagram**, **LinkedIn**, **YouTube**, and **X/Twitter**, and to see all other opportunities to join us + our values, check out our **Careers Page**.

What else do we offer?
* Genuine career progression pathways and mentoring programs
* Culture of innovation, technology, collaboration, and openness
* Flexible, diverse, and international work environment



Giving back is a huge part of our culture. Alongside an extra “change the world” day plus another for personal development, we also highly encourage participation in our **Corporate Responsibility Employee Programs*****Qlik is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action*****Employer,*****and we value the diversity of our workforce*****.**Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, or disability status. title: Receptionist Scandic Sundsvall City
description:
**Nu söker vi en Receptionist till Scandic Sundsvall City.**



Oavsett varför gästen kommer till oss är det få saker som är så uppskattade som ett vänligt ansikte som hälsar välkommen. Du agerar värd tillsammans med övriga teamet på hotellet och skapar en gästupplevelse i världsklass.



Hos oss får du ta ett stort eget ansvar för att ta de beslut som krävs för att göra gästen nöjd och teamen utvecklar och förbättrar arbetssätt och service i takt med att omvärlden förändras. Vi är nämligen övertygade om att det är när du får utvecklas och bidra med all din kompetens och erfarenhet som vi överträffar gästens förväntningar. På köpet får vi kul på jobbet!



Så ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss – och bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic!


**Vad är innebär rollen?**



Du som arbetar i receptionen är ansvarig för att våra gäster får service i världsklass. Du är spindeln i nätet som ser till att gästen alltid är i fokus. Du är den som går igenom ankomstlistan och lägger tid på detaljerna. Ser till att gästens önskemål uppfylls. Du har alltid ett leende på läpparna och en kreativ lösning i bakfickan. Du löser det mesta och är en stjärna på att vända en missnöjd gäst till en nöjd gäst. Din arbetsplats är vår lobby. För det är där du möter flest gäster. I ansvarsområdet ingår även administrativt arbete, säkerhetsarbete och arbete med försäljning.


Arbetet i receptionen innebär att checka in och ut hotellets gäster, hälsa välkommen och ge gästen den information den behöver om sin vistelse. Du hanterar bokningar i systemet Opera Cloud och hanterar administrativa uppgifter runt gäster och säkerhet. Allt arbete sker med gästnöjdhet och försäljning i fokus.


Hotellet har öppet dygnet runt och det är därför viktigt att du trivs med att arbeta i skift (förmiddagar, eftermiddagar och helger).


**Vem är du?**



För att passa i rollen tror vi att du har en väl utvecklad social förmåga och är kapabel att hantera att det händer många olika saker samtidigt. Det är mycket viktigt att du kan förmedla ett gott värdskap till hotellets gäster.



Du har också vana och kunskap i att arbeta med dator som arbetsredskap.


Eftersom arbetet till stor del består av att kommunicera med gäster är goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska en förutsättning. Talar du ytterligare ett språk är det meriterande.


Allra viktigast är dock dina personliga egenskaper och din inställning. För att passa i rollen behöver du vara en lyhörd och prestigelös lagspelare som tar ett stort ansvar för dina arbetsuppgifter och helhetsresultatet.


**Information om tjänsten**



Tjänsten ör ett sommarvikariat. Din närmsta chef kommer att vara vår receptionschef. Tjänsten omfattar att arbeta i skift (förmiddagar, eftermiddagar och helger).


Vi tar enbart emot ansökningar via vår hemsida. Alla ansökningar kommer att behandlas löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag, varför vi ber dig att ansöka så snart som möjligt. I denna rekrytering använder vi oss av ett enklare test om service vid urvalet.



Vi ser fram emot att välkomna dig till oss på Scandic!



Ps. på vår hemsida kan du läsa mer om vår kultur, vad tjänsten innebär och om våra förmåner!


  
**Vi har riktigt bra förmåner**
-------------------------------


Rabatt när du äter, dricker och övernattar hos oss


Family & Friends rabatt för din familj och vänner


Rabatt hos våra partnerföretag


Pension & försäkringar enligt kollektivavtal


Friskvårdsbidrag


Utbildning och utveckling via interna plattformar


  
Vi når längre när olikheter bejakas. Hos oss får du utrymme att vara dig själv och utvecklas i den riktning du vill, med trygga villkor och schyssta avtal som grund. Ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss - bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic.



Delar du våra värderingar?


**BE A PRO** **BE YOU** **BE CARING** **BE BOLD**

  

  

...uppmuntrar alla att göra skillnad för miljön och att det var en av våra kollegor inom housekeeping som kom på idén om ”häng-upp-handduken”.
...i Sverige blivit rankad som besöksnäringens mest attraktiva arbetsgivare två år i rad, i Visitas årliga undersökning.
... bara serverar kaffe som är ekologiskt och Fairtrade eller UTZ-certifierat.
...tack vare vårt stora miljöengagemang, blivit rankad som branschens mest hållbara arbetsgivare elva år i rad, av Sustainable Brand Index.
...under 2014 inledde ett samarbete med organisationen Real Stars, centrerat kring ”Fair Sex”, dvs. arbete mot människo- och sexhandel.

title: Solution Consultant to Accenture Song Customer Tech
description:
**Accenture Song** — As the world’s largest, most disruptive digital agency, we drive lasting growth for clients by helping them design, build, and run meaningful business and customer experiences. We are a bold and generous team of creatives, designers, technologists, strategists and engineers working together to make possibilities a reality. Accenture Song is committed to our employees and helps you get the most out of your career by igniting your full potential!


For the team in Copenhagen and Stockholm, Accenture Song is seeking a Solution Consultant with developer background ready to contribute to global digital marketing projects for a range of international brands. Here you will have the ability to contribute and grow quickly in a truly international environment when advising our clients throughout the implementation process and together we create a playful and warm culture that gives room to grow and thrive.

 **Is this the right role for you?**


Do you want new challenges in a forward-looking and energetic environment with focus leading marketing technologies, such as Adobe Experience Cloud or Salesforce Marketing Cloud? You will be working cross-functionally with our project managers, marketing consultant, creatives and other solution consultants to implement new tools and platforms for our clients.


  

**We are looking for a new colleague with the following profile:**

* Master’s or bachelor’s degree in computer science, software development or similar background
* You have experience with solutions within the Adobe Experience Cloud or similar marketing and e-commerce technologies
* Minimum 2 years of experience with Adobe Marketo or Adobe Campaign
* You have experience as a back end or full stack developer and possess excellent programming skills.
* You have experience working with data modelling and integrations and do not shy away when it comes to making architectural decisions
* Analytic mindset – you enjoy working close to clients, with the ability to keep an overview when working with data
* You enjoy finding solid solutions for complex challenges and helping clients to plot a course in the ever-changing landscape of marketing technology
* You have solid English communication skills in both writing and speaking
* You are self-motivated and an excellent team player with a strong collaborative attitude

 **What is in it for you?**

* A good and inclusive working environment, where you will work with inspiring and highly motivated team of experienced developers making you grow both personally and professionally.
* You will have the ability to develop your career and build your technical and analytical skills while gaining knowledge in marketing technologies and the latest trends in marketing automation.
* Meaningful and interesting client project. Early on you will be given responsibility and therefore have an impact on delivering exciting projects.
* You will get the chance to work with big clients and have your fingerprint in the development process and in Accenture Song as an organization.
* A dedicated mentor following your career journey and a strong learning culture
* Responsibility, trust and an inclusive work environment
* The opportunity to get involved in Accenture´s volunteering, sport- and social groups
* Access to industry and capability specialists in all corners of the world with first-class international knowledge and experience
* Competitive compensation and benefits

**Investing in you**


Choose a career at Accenture and enjoy an innovative environment where challenging and interesting work is part of daily life. Submit your application, CV, cover letter and relevant degrees online today.
company_description: Our 721,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success.

title: ServiceNow Sales Leader Nordics – Senior Sales Professional
description:
**Job Description:**


DXC Technology and ServiceNow have maintained a collaborative relationship for over 15 years, working together to provide exemplary service to our clients. As a Global Elite Partner with ServiceNow, DXC has successfully completed over 7,000 implementations with a dedicated team of more than 1,800 certified ServiceNow specialists. Our personnel possess expertise in their respective fields, ensuring top-tier service delivery.


We are expanding our European Sales team and seeking a dynamic individual to fill a dual role as a ServiceNow Sales Leader and Senior Sales Professional. This position is vital within our high-performance sales organization as we engage with industry-leading clients to tackle complex business challenges while promoting ServiceNow solutions.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Lead the Nordic Sales team and act as Sales Professional to drive the Swedish Market
* Develop and drive the ServiceNow sales pipeline to enhance DXC’s market share within the ServiceNow ecosystem.
* Utilize expertise in ServiceNow modernization, optimization, and customer adoption models to identify new client opportunities and expand existing relationships, collaborating closely with DXC’s sales teams across EMEA.
* Foster strong working relationships with DXC Account Executives, Technical Solutions Consultants, and partner sales teams to ensure effective engagement and support.
* Engage in opportunity qualification, risk assessment, and develop a winning value proposition aligned with client needs, leading in processes such as EOI, RFI, and RFP.
* Lead and participate in the development and execution of the regional and global ServiceNow sales strategy for the Nordic countries
* Owning Order Entry Targets for the Nordic countries
* Collaborate on forecasting to provide leadership with visibility into pipeline status and risk analysis relative to target bookings.
* Oversee the technical validation of solutions for deals, ensuring alignment with delivery capabilities.
* Establish a detailed deal timeline and coordinate pursuit team efforts to meet milestones and objectives.


Manage resource needs early in the sales pursuit process to ensure expedient and effective engagement.

**Qualifications**

* Strong technical knowledge of ServiceNow, including cloud modernization, application transformation, and license models.
* Proven experience in sales with a track record of supporting and developing deals ranging from $200k to $10 million.
* Demonstrated consultative approach with exceptional solution development and business development skills, capable of engaging with CXOs of global organizations.
* Experience in consulting and a deep understanding of the ServiceNow ecosystem is highly advantageous.
* Familiarity with industry verticals, particularly in IT, and how to tailor ServiceNow solutions accordingly.
* Ability to develop clients' high-level ServiceNow strategies and roadmaps, and effectively communicate value propositions that justify pricing innovations.
* ServiceNow Sales Experience is key
* Familiarity with cloud based technologies and how to do projects as Service Provider is a must
* Fluent in Swedish, both written and spoken.
* Fluent in English, both written and spoken

**What We Offer**


Join one of the premier ServiceNow partners committed to excellence. You’ll benefit from ongoing training and development opportunities, access to certifications, and a supportive team environment. Strong collaboration in the entire European Sales team drives our joint success. We offer a comprehensive benefits package including pension plans, life and health insurance, as well as flexible benefits tailored to your needs.


If you are a results-driven professional excited about leveraging your experience in both sales leadership and ServiceNow technology, we invite you to pursue this opportunity with us at DXC Technology.


Recruitment fraud is a scheme in which fictitious job opportunities are offered to job seekers typically through online services, such as false websites, or through unsolicited emails claiming to be from the company. These emails may request recipients to provide personal information or to make payments as part of their illegitimate recruiting process. DXC does not make offers of employment via social media networks and DXC never asks for any money or payments from applicants at any point in the recruitment process, nor ask a job seeker to purchase IT or other equipment on our behalf. More information on employment scams is available here*.*

* Strong troubleshooting skills to debug models and optimize performance.
* Strong communication and collaboration skills.

title: Lösningsspecialist med fokus inom Cloud och Datacenter
description:
Atea är i en förändringsresa och söker nu nästa kollega som brinner för Cloud och Datacenter! Känner du att du blir lite extra exalterad när du får prata om it och teknik? Är du en person med ett starkt driv att lära dig och utvecklas mer inom it, som dessutom har ett intresse och en ådra för försäljning? Är du intresserad av att komma in i en roll där du får möjlighet att växa och utvecklas tillsammans med några av de tyngsta namnen i it-branschen? Då är detta en unik chans för dig!


**Din roll**
------------



I denna roll kommer du att komma in i ett tätt sammansvetsat och mycket kompetent gäng, där du genom mentorskap och utbildning får växa. Teamet arbetar med inriktning mot Datacenter (Cloud, Hyperkonvergerat, backup, storage, server, IoT etc.), och it-säkerhetslösningar. Din roll som Lösningsspecialist (specialistsäljare) innebär att du kommer att driva och utveckla affärer mot Ateas kunder i Region Syd. Ditt fokus kommer vara på DC/Cloud lösningar och att hjälpa kunderna i deras utveckling av nuvarande miljöer, men även hjälpa dem på resan mot digitalisering och IoT-lösningar. I detta team finns en stolthet i att presentera den bästa lösningen för kunden och detta görs i samråd med några av branschens vassaste it-konsulter. I din närmaste chef, Philip Island, hittar vi en chef som arbetar hårt med att vidareutveckla sina anställda och att skapa rätt förutsättningar för dem genom ett individanpassat ledarskap


**Vem är du?**
--------------


**Som person känner du troligtvis igen dig på följande**



Du har ett intresse och kompetens för DC/Cloud lösningar. Kanske har du läst en teknisk utbildning men känner att du har en känsla och ett intresse för försäljning, eller så är det precis tvärtom. Du är som person väldigt social och har ett service- och affärstänk som Atea värdesätter högt, då de jobbar nära sina kunder och deras it-personal och användare. Du tar personligt ansvar och brinner för att arbeta kundfokuserat med it-lösningar. Vidare är du driven i ditt arbete och har ett intresse av att skapa mervärde för kunden, som du kan bemöta med trovärdighet och ett förtroendeingivande sätt. Mycket av detta kommer med erfarenhet, men det viktiga är att vi kan se dessa egenskaper hos dig, att du har en positiv inställning till förändring och att du vill fortsätta utvecklas i din yrkesroll.



Vidare ser vi att du har körkort, då tjänsten innebär resor inom regionen. Vi ser även att du bor någonstans där du har möjlighet att utgå ifrån något av följande kontor: Malmö, Helsingborg eller Kristianstad.

  


**För att lyckas i tjänsten som specialistsäljare inom nätverk och kommunikation bör du ha följande kompetenser**


* Tidigare erfarenhet från liknande roll
* Kunskap kring Datacenter och cloud (Azure, AWS, HPE, Dell, Nutanix, NetApp, VM-ware, Cisco och liknande)
* God samarbetsförmåga, en lagspelare
* En nyfikenhet och ett driv att vilja lära sig och utvecklas
* Pondus och ett förtroendeingivande sätt Ateas erbjudande till dig


Hos oss är det alltid nära till beslut. Vi har en målmedveten satsning på coachande ledarskap och våra medarbetares personliga utveckling och hälsa. Vår kultur präglas av våra värderingar, en kultur där framåtanda, humor, kamratskap och ett visst mått av galenskap är helt naturligt. En kultur som gjort oss till Sveriges största leverantör av informationsteknologi och tillhörande tjänster.



Vi har alltid stora saker på gång. Vi gillar att utmana oss själva och går ofta vår egen väg. Vi gör det tack vare modiga medarbetare som sporras av stora mål.


**Om Atea**
-----------



Visste du att Atea är den ledande leverantören av IT-infrastruktur i Norden och Baltikum? I Sverige är vi runt 2700 medarbetare fördelade på 35 kontor runt om i hela landet. Vår styrka ligger i vår kombination av lokal närvaro, vårt omfattande och heltäckande erbjudande samt alla våra specialister. Tillsammans med våra kunder och partners bygger vi Sverige med IT och förbättra vardagen för skolbarn, lärare, äldre, sjukvård och näringslivet. Hos oss får du vara en del av världens mest hållbara IT-servicebolag, där vi är med och påskyndar omställningen mot en mer hållbar IT-värld.



På Atea blir du en del av en vardag och en kultur som präglas av framåtanda, laganda och humor. Vi har en vision om att vara "The Place to Be" – en plats där alla växer och trivs, med kollegor som bryr sig om dig, om kunderna och om samhället.


**Kontakt & mer information**
-----------------------------



Välkommen med din ansökan! Har du frågor om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta Philip Island, Regional affärsområdeschef, via, philip.island@atea.se



Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum. Atea vill vara The Place To Be och därför värdesätter vi de kvalitéer som en jämn ålders- och könsfördelning samt etnisk och kulturell mångfald tillför verksamheten. Som ett kvalitativt led i vårt sedvanliga rekryteringsarbete genomgår våra slutkandidater en bakgrundskontroll, detta för att öka kännedomen om våra framtida medarbetare.

  


**Följ oss i sociala medier**

  

#LI-HYBRID

title: Receptionist Scandic Frimurarehotellet
description:
Endast 150 meter från Linköpings centralstation ligger Scandic Frimurarehotellet – hotellet där tradition och framtid möts. Beläget strax intill Domkyrkan i en av Linköpings vackraste byggnader ligger vårt moderna och avslappnade hotell med anor från 1912. Hotellet är Östergötlands största och arrangerar allt från möten och bröllop till stora banketter. Vi som jobbar här är närmare hundra medarbetare och vi har vårt ursprung från ungefär hela världen, precis som våra gäster. Att vi är ett stort hotell och att de tre Scandic hotellen i Linköping har gemensam ledning medför mycket goda utvecklingsmöjligheter för våra medarbetare.


**Nu söker vi en Receptionist till Scandic Frimurarehotellet.**

**Vad är innebär rollen?**



Du som arbetar i receptionen är ansvarig för att våra gäster får service i världsklass. Du är spindeln i nätet som ser till att gästen alltid är i fokus. Du är den som går igenom ankomstlistan och lägger tid på detaljerna. Ser till att gästens önskemål uppfylls. Du har alltid ett leende på läpparna och en kreativ lösning i bakfickan. Du löser det mesta och är en stjärna på att vända en missnöjd gäst till en nöjd gäst. Din arbetsplats är vår lobby. För det är där du möter flest gäster. I ansvarsområdet ingår även administrativt arbete, säkerhetsarbete och arbete med försäljning.


Arbetet i receptionen innebär att checka in och ut hotellets gäster, hälsa välkommen och ge gästen den information den behöver om sin vistelse. Du hanterar bokningar i systemet Opera Cloud och hanterar administrativa uppgifter runt gäster och säkerhet. Allt arbete sker med gästnöjdhet och försäljning i fokus.


Hotellet har öppet dygnet runt och det är därför viktigt att du trivs med att arbeta i skift (förmiddagar, eftermiddagar och helger).


**Vem är du?**



För att passa i rollen tror vi att du har en väl utvecklad social förmåga och är kapabel att hantera att det händer många olika saker samtidigt. Det är mycket viktigt att du kan förmedla ett gott värdskap till hotellets gäster.



Du har också vana och kunskap i att arbeta med dator som arbetsredskap.


Eftersom arbetet till stor del består av att kommunicera med gäster är goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska en förutsättning. Talar du ytterligare ett språk är det meriterande.


Allra viktigast är dock dina personliga egenskaper och din inställning. För att passa i rollen behöver du vara en lyhörd och prestigelös lagspelare som tar ett stort ansvar för dina arbetsuppgifter och helhetsresultatet.


**Information om tjänsten**



Vi söker engagerade kollegor för sommaren och även fortsatt för hösten för enstaka dagar på extra vid behov.


Jobbet omfattar för- och eftermiddagsshift, vardagar och helger. Nattarbete kan förekomma.



Vi tar enbart emot ansökningar via vår hemsida. Alla ansökningar kommer att behandlas löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag, varför vi ber dig att ansöka så snart som möjligt. I denna rekrytering använder vi oss av ett enklare test om service vid urvalet.



Vi ser fram emot att välkomna dig till oss på Scandic!



Ps. på vår hemsida kan du läsa mer om vår kultur, vad tjänsten innebär och om våra förmåner!


  
**Vi har riktigt bra förmåner**
-------------------------------


Rabatt när du äter, dricker och övernattar hos oss


Family & Friends rabatt för din familj och vänner


Rabatt hos våra partnerföretag


Pension & försäkringar enligt kollektivavtal


Friskvårdsbidrag


Utbildning och utveckling via interna plattformar


  
Vi når längre när olikheter bejakas. Hos oss får du utrymme att vara dig själv och utvecklas i den riktning du vill, med trygga villkor och schyssta avtal som grund. Ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss - bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic.



Delar du våra värderingar?


**BE A PRO** **BE YOU** **BE CARING** **BE BOLD**

  

  

...uppmuntrar alla att göra skillnad för miljön och att det var en av våra kollegor inom housekeeping som kom på idén om ”häng-upp-handduken”.
...i Sverige blivit rankad som besöksnäringens mest attraktiva arbetsgivare två år i rad, i Visitas årliga undersökning.
... bara serverar kaffe som är ekologiskt och Fairtrade eller UTZ-certifierat.
...tack vare vårt stora miljöengagemang, blivit rankad som branschens mest hållbara arbetsgivare elva år i rad, av Sustainable Brand Index.
...under 2014 inledde ett samarbete med organisationen Real Stars, centrerat kring ”Fair Sex”, dvs. arbete mot människo- och sexhandel.

10963 Berlin
company_description: Nordiskt hotellföretag i världsklass som skapar enastående upplevelser för de många människorna. 16 000 medarbetar, 280 hotell i 6 länder.

title: Team Manager for Public websites and Intra \u007C SEB, Solna
description:
Do you want to lead development teams in an agile- and technical transformation and be part of an organization that explore new technologies. Work in an exciting environment with highly skilled colleagues, transforming SEBs technical landscape and providing an excellent customer experience!  

SEB is more than just a bank with an IT function. We are a progressive tech company powered by innovation and fueled by collaboration. From COBOL to AI and everything in between, we offer you an impressive tech stack and several technology paths. Together we're innovating for a sustainable society and building the tech arena of the future, a welcoming space for everyone. Are you ready to take on a new challenge? If so, you'll be interested in this opportunity!  

About the role  

You will lead three agile development teams within the Savings Offerings and Digital Interaction & Distribution department, where you are responsible for both staff and the IT delivery.  

One of the department main responsibilities is to provide group common tech enablers that facilitate a coherent & secure customer experience in channels
The responsibility for you together with your team is to provide secure, reliable and future proof platforms and tools for public and internal websites, content management and marketing automation. You will be part of several important initiatives, both to increase speed on our cloud transformation also make sure that we have the platforms and tools to cater for personalized and relevant customer communication & interactions  

Your team is located in Arenastaden, consists of highly skilled employees and consultants, 14 persons today with the ambition to grow a bit more going forward.  

Your development teams are part of two tribes, Marketing Technology and Digital Workplace Services and Communication, working closely together with Product Owners and other stakeholders.  

You will be a part of the Digital Interaction & Distribution management team and report to department manager, Nicklas von Wachenfeldt.  

To thrive in this role, we believe you have
To get the most success in your role you need to be able to take both a strategic and operational approach in all you do. You have a few years of experience of leading development teams as a manager or other type of leading roles, preferably in a complex and high demanding environment. You have a proven ability to lead in a changing landscape from both a technical and a process point of view, making sure your team has the best possible way of working. You are experienced in handling both internal and external stakeholders.  

As a person you are equally passionate about people, technology and business. You are secure in communicating with developers as well as other stakeholders at all levels in the company. You are curious, solution-oriented and have a natural drive to collaborate with others.  

What we offer* Entrepreneurial Scandinavian environment.
* International opportunities and working environment.
* Attractive compensation and access to SEB staff banking with exclusive benefits.
* Agile and modern ways of working.
* A flat hierarchy and openness to share ideas, opinions and points of views.
* Remote working possibilities and flexible work schedule.

  


**Do you want to be part of SEB?**
It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.  

Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today via the link in this ad, but no later than April 11th. If you have questions about the position, please contact Talent Acquisition Partner Katarina Pihl by email katarina.pihl@seb.se (but we will not process applications via email).  

Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and criminal records checks. In some cases, we also apply random drug checks.  

Learn more about working at SEB on our Career website or through our Career podcasts. https://sebgroup.com/careerhttps://bit.ly/SEBcareer
company_description: More than 15.000 people work at SEB. Working in SEB means being part of an exciting journey, driven by digital transformation

title: Dev Business Analyst, Associate
description:
General information
Country
Sweden


City
Kista


Job ID
44083


Department
Development


Experience Level
ENTRY\_LEVEL


Employment Status
FULL\_TIME


Workplace Type
Hybrid


Description & Requirements
Are you interested in working in a highly international team where you’ll gain insight into logistics activities across different industries? Would you like to understand how IT systems help improve speed and accuracy when managing warehouses, planning transport, and executing distribution?


Come and join our team to help shape the future of industry enterprise cloud applications. We are looking for a newly graduated talent to join our Supply Chain Execution team as a Development Business Analyst.


Our product delivers rich, industry-specific functionality to meet the needs of companies in sectors such as chemical, distribution, equipment, fashion, food and beverage, and industrial manufacturing.


Based in our modern Kista office north of Stockholm, you will work alongside a talented and international team with diverse skills, ranging from application experts to associate product developers. Our team members are driven and friendly colleagues, all working towards the common goal of delivering high-quality new functionalities in a Cloud environment.


You will gradually gain an understanding of the architecture of a large-scale and complex system, and learn about business practices across different industries, while creating technical solutions to address those realities. You will also gain experience in system design, quality assurance, and test automation.


We believe in learning by doing, so we will support you as you get up to speed. We are humble, yet result-oriented, team players, and we hope you are too.


Your focus will be on designing new functions and features, as well as maintaining existing ones. The role also involves analysis, testing, and documentation, working closely with skilled software engineers.


The strength of our company lies with our employees, and we strive to offer a good balance between work and leisure while providing opportunities for personal development.

  

A Day in the Life Typically Includes:

* Solution analysis and design for new functionality, as well as improvement of existing business functionality.
* Working through the entire system development lifecycle, from initial design to an executable feature.
* Assisting and guiding colleagues with functional knowledge within your area of expertise.
* Sharing ideas with fellow business analysts, collaborating with programmers, and discussing new requirements with product managers.
  

  

What You Will Need:


We are looking for a colleague with an interest in development work, who is passionate about finding solutions and helping customers succeed. Prior experience in specific systems is valuable but not required. The most important things we’re looking for are:

* An academic degree in business engineering, systems science, or a related field.
* The ability to creatively address large, complex problems with detailed, solution-oriented thinking.
* Strong communication skills, with the ability to explain complex concepts clearly.
* Fluency in English.
* A genuine interest in learning about coding, even if it’s not your area of expertise.
  

  

What Will Put You Ahead:


While not required, experience or knowledge in the following areas is a plus:

* Database management.
* ERP systems (experience with any system is helpful).
* Logistics software or experience working in a distribution facility or larger warehouse.
* General programming knowledge or the ability to read and understand code.

If this sounds like a role you’d like to pursue, submit your application today! We conduct interviews continuously as applications are received.

  

  

About Infor  

Infor is a global leader in business cloud software products for companies in industry specific markets. Infor builds complete industry suites in the cloud and efficiently deploys technology that puts the user experience first, leverages data science, and integrates easily into existing systems. Over 60,000 organizations worldwide rely on Infor to help overcome market disruptions and achieve business-wide digital transformation.
For more information visit www.infor.com  


Our Values  

At Infor, we strive for an environment that is founded on a business philosophy called Principle Based Management™ (PBM™) and eight Guiding Principles: integrity, stewardship & compliance, transformation, principled entrepreneurship, knowledge, humility, respect, self-actualization. Increasing diversity is important to reflect our markets, customers, partners, and communities we serve in now and in the future.  

We have a relentless commitment to a culture based on PBM. Informed by the principles that allow a free and open society to flourish, PBM™ prepares individuals to innovate, improve, and transform while fostering a healthy, growing organization that creates long-term value for its clients and supporters and fulfillment for its employees.  

Infor is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive work environment. Infor does not discriminate against candidates or employees because of their sex, race, gender identity, disability, age, sexual orientation, religion, national origin, veteran status, or any other protected status under the law. If you require accommodation or assistance at any time during the application or selection processes, please submit a request by following the directions located in the FAQ section at the bottom of the infor.com/about/careers webpage.
company_description: Infor builds complete industry suites in the cloud and efficiently deploys technology that puts the user experience first, leverages data science, and integrates easily into existing systems.

t
